creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas
description: small neck opening; pendants in front and back; one long pendant with three strands of silver metal faceted beads and grey, brown and cream shell with horizontal openwork beaded bar above it with silver metal faceted beads and gold metal barrel beads; V shaped section with silver beads above bar; back pendant is wedge-shaped leather with silver and gold faceted beads and two silver metal discs
medium: Leather, iron and other metals, shell, fibers, ochre pigment
title: Woman's necklace
